attributes.action: Ignore EU rules and give TATA Steel a tax break in order to save the 1,200 jobs
attributes.background: We are sick of the EU sticking their nose in and dictating to us how we can run our country's industries! TATA are having to axe 1,200 jobs as they owe around £15m in taxes, we want the government to give a break on that tax with the condition that it goes towards saving the jobs of their workers!
